title: Add Admin Dashboard link to mobile navigation menu

requirements.summary: Add Admin Dashboard link to mobile menu so authenticated users can access admin functionality from mobile devices
acceptanceCriteria: Admin Dashboard link appears in the mobile menu alongside Home, Submit AC, Pricing Info, and Contact links
Mobile menu displays all navigation options including Admin Dashboard when hamburger icon is clicked
Admin Dashboard link in mobile menu navigates to /admin route when clicked
Mobile menu closes after Admin Dashboard link is clicked

file_operations.description: Add Admin Dashboard navigation link to the mobile menu section within the Sheet component. Include the link with conditional rendering based on authentication state (isAuthenticated from useInternetIdentity hook), matching the existing desktop navigation pattern. Ensure the link uses the same earth-tone styling as other mobile menu items and closes the mobile menu when clicked using setMobileMenuOpen(false). Place the Admin link in the mobile menu list after the Contact link to match the desktop navigation order.
